resources.string: Animals to include in the quiz
One animal subgroup must be selected. Setting Bird as the default animal subgroup.
Quiz will restart with your new settings
Image of the current species in the quiz
Number of questions in the quiz

Test your knowledge of New Zealand (NZ) birds by correctly identifying a bird by name from a selection of images.

Access the settings during the quiz to change the total number of questions and the number of options displayed at each question. More options makes it harder!

At the end of the quiz there is the option to \'reset quiz\', which will provide another random selection of birds from a total of 370 odd images. Enjoy!
